attributes.action: Introduce legislation that ensures a minimum 51% fan ownership of football clubs
attributes.additional_details: Greedy football owners don’t have their fans’ interests at heart. To ensure football clubs continue to have the incredible impact in the community that they do, we must safeguard the beautiful game from greedy profiteering
attributes.background: A phased process, similar to the German football model in which fans own a controlling interest in their clubs.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583310
